mapper.sql: uid, uname, upass, gender, regTime, head
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_user
uid,
uname,
upass,
gender,
regTime,
head,
#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{upass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{head,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tbl_user
uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upass = #{upass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regTime = #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
head = #{head,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_user set uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upass = #{upass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regTime = #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, head = #{head,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_user where uname=#{uname} and upass=#{upass}
